data.name: Desktop AI - Lily
data.detailed_description:
Playing games and working on your computer, Desktop AI next to you!
You can display characters on your desktop. Enjoy a conversation with Lily!
Even if this is a desktop mascot, it will give you peace of mind.
The desktop is not lonely. Lily is warmly waiting for you.

・ Enter the text and it will respond.

・ She name is Lily, please be kind.

・ Is it difficult to find it? It's okay, you can hide it immediately with the x button on the upper left

・ maybe when you connect the microphone and talk...

・ You can move it with the mouse, it's easy!

・ There is also a shooting game where you click the crystal. Aim, high score

・ The high score of the creator is 1700

(This character is just AI. Please do not excessive expectations.)

Speech recognition time: 100 minutes

data.short_description: Characters on your desktop, Desktop AI!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit OS required
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1030
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual
